entity.label: Account Secret Type

inputs.title: Inputs
inputs.description: Create inputs to collect data from Microsoft Cloud Services.

entity.label: Name
entity.help: Add unique name for the input

validators.errorMsg: Length of index name should be between 1 and 80.

entity.label: Sourcetype
entity.help: Select a sourcetype according to configured eventhub and diagnostic settings.

entity.label: Interval
entity.help: Collection interval for this input (in seconds).

entity.label: Enable Blob Checkpoint Store
entity.help: Azure Storage Account and Container Name is required when this is enabled

entity.label: Azure Storage Account
entity.help: Enter the storage account for configuring Blob Checkpoint Store

entity.label: Container Name
entity.help: Enter the container name under the storage account. You can only add one container name for each input.

validators.errorMsg: The Container Name must be between 3 and 63 characters long.
This Container Name can only contain lowercase letters, numbers and hyphens.
The Container Name must begin with a letter or a number and each hyphen must be preceded and followed by a non-hyphen character.

options.saveValidator: function(formData) { if(!formData.blob_checkpoint_enabled || formData.blob_checkpoint_enabled === '0') {return true; } if (!formData.storage_account) {return 'Field Azure Storage Account is required';} if(!formData.container_name) { return 'Field Container Name is required'; } return true; }

entity.help: The names of the tables to query. You can enter specific table name, wildcard or regex syntax, e.g. table, test*, :table\d+. For metrics tables, enter the full table name, e.g., $MetricsCapacityBlob.

entity.label: Start Time
entity.help: The add-on starts collecting data with a date later than this time. The default start time is 30 days ago.

entity.label: Blob List
entity.help: Enter the Blob name which you want to collect the data from. You can add multiple blob names separated by commas. For example, blob, testblob* or {"blob1":1, "test*":2, "blob\d+":3}

entity.label: Excluded Blob List
entity.help: Enter the Blob name that you do not want to collect the data from. You can add multiple blob names separated by commas.

entity.label: Decoding
entity.help: Specify the character set of the blobs. e.g UTF-8, UTF-32, etc..
